name: Flip of the Card
description:
The King Is Dead! Long Live The King! You're kingdom is in shambles from politics. How would this do?                                                   

Theme:

The Jam had "Roll the Dice" as the theme. As a kingdom, the people's actions are incredibly unpredictable. It's to the point where their actions seem to be at the roll of the dice. At the start of the game, the parties are randomized, changing the way you make decisions. You must navigate the best decisions even though their actions are entirely random.

How To Play

The parties are randomized at the start of each game.

1. Authoritarian
2. Democratic
3. Extremist
4. Religious
These demographics are listed in the pie chart in the bottom left randomized.

You must figure out which party is which based on your actions.

Each Action would promote one party or decrease another.
Navigate the political landscape without having one party take over!

Made in 48 Hours for GMTK22
